original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 795: Liferay, Now We’re Thinking With Portals
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and Doc Searls chat with Olaf Kock and Dave Nebinger about Liferay! Thats a Java project that started as an implementation of a web portal, and has turned into a very flexible platform for any sort of web application. How has this Open Source project turned into a very successful business? And how is it connected to most iconic childrens educational show of all time? Listen to find out!
